dcterms:description: This dataset captures socially interacting multiple individuals via a multi-view camera system. It is used to simulate sparse 2D view scenarios by choosing a single camera view as the input for reconstruction.
dcterms:title: Panoptic Dataset

dcterms:creator: Yifei Yin
Chen Guo
Manuel Kaufmann
Juan Zarate
Jie Song
Otmar Hilliges
dcterms:description: This dataset contains multiple individuals at close distances, captured with synchronized 8 cameras. It is used for evaluating the performance of reconstruction methods in challenging scenarios.
dcterms:title: Hi4D

dcterms:creator: Sida Peng
Yuanqing Zhang
Yinghao Xu
Qianqian Wang
Qing Shuai
Hujun Bao
Xiaowei Zhou
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for evaluating the performance of models on single human reconstruction tasks with sufficient observations. It provides a benchmark for assessing reconstruction quality.
dcterms:title: ZJU-Mocap
